column3: na da a odzi dapɛn no kan no enyim retsetsew no
column4: Mary Magdalene nye Mary baako no baa dɛ wɔrobɔhwɛ nda no."
na Ewuradze bɔfoe fi sor sianee na ɔbae bepireew ɔbo no fii nda no ano

column2: "Na no ho hu ntsi hɔn a wɔroweɔn no ho popoe

column4: na minyim dɛ hom rohwehwɛ Jesus a wɔbɔɔ no mbeamudua mu no."

column2: "Onnyi ha: na ɔasoɛr dɛ mbrɛ ɔkae no: hom mbra mbɔhwɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze dae."

column2: "Na wofiir edzi ntsɛm fii nda no ho dze suro nye dɛw kɛse tutuu mbirika dɛ wɔrekɛka akyerɛ n’esuafo no."

column3: Jesus hyiaa hɔn see hɔn dɛ
column4: Mema hom mbo na yɛ o!  Na wɔbaa bosusuoo n’anan mu

column3: Mma hom nnsuro; hom nkɔ nkɛka nkyerɛ mo nuanom dɛ wɔnkɔ Galilii

column7: Anadwe a yɛdae no nna n’esuafo bae bowiaa no."

column4: na yɛamma annyɛ hom do asɛm."

column3: na wɔkɛyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn no; na asɛm yi tahyee wɔ Jewfo mu dze bodu ndɛ."

column2: "Na esuafo dubiako no sii mu kɔr Galilii

wɔkotoow no; na binom gyee ekyingye."
